Html:
I implement a Customize Control of DataGridTemplateColumn and let it derive from DataGridTemplateColumn, but how to set its Resources, since I have one defined ResourceDictonary.

Dose anyone know the answer?Thanks very much! Dan

Hi Dan,

You should be able to set the Resources on the DataTemplate which you put inside the CellTemplate of your DataGridTemplateColumn, like so:

             <DataGrid>
                <DataGrid.Columns>
                    <DataGridTemplateColumn>
                        <DataGridTemplateColumn.CellTemplate>
                            <DataTemplate Resources="...">
                                ...
                            </DataTemplate>
                        </DataGridTemplateColumn.CellTemplate>
                    </DataGridTemplateColumn>
                </DataGrid.Columns>
            </DataGrid> 

Is that what you were looking for?

Thanks,
Samantha
